info.title: Fern Developer API
info.description: Easily integrate on and off-ramps into and out of your token of choice

bearerAuth.description: API key must be provided as a Bearer token. Format: fsk_<base64-encoded-string>

type.description: Type of beneficiary - individual or business entity
type.title: Beneficiary Type

beneficiary.description: Details about the bank account beneficiary
beneficiary.title: Beneficiary Information

achRoutingNumber.description: ACH routing number for domestic US transfers

wireRoutingNumber.description: Wire routing number for wire transfers

accountName.description: Name on the account (if different from beneficiary)

bankAccountInformation.description: Banking details including account numbers, routing numbers, and account type
bankAccountInformation.title: Bank Account Information

schema.description: Request payload for creating a new bank account. Requires either ACH or Wire routing number.
schema.title: Create Bank Account Request

id.description: Unique identifier of the bank account

accountMask.description: Last 4 digits of the account number

type.title: Beneficiary Type

schema.description: Response payload containing bank account details
schema.title: Bank Account Response

accountMask.description: Last 4 digits of the account number

schema.title: Bank Account Response

schema.description: Unique identifier of the bank account

address.description: Physical address information with standardized country and state codes
address.title: Address

type.description: Type of beneficiary - individual or business entity
type.title: Beneficiary Type

beneficiary.description: Updated beneficiary information - all fields are optional

achRoutingNumber.description: ACH routing number for domestic US transfers

wireRoutingNumber.description: Wire routing number for wire transfers

accountName.description: Name on the account (if different from beneficiary)

bankAccountInformation.description: Updated bank account information - all fields are optional

schema.description: Request payload for updating an existing bank account. All fields except customerId are optional.
schema.title: Update Bank Account Request

id.description: Unique identifier of the bank account

accountMask.description: Last 4 digits of the account number

type.description: The type of beneficiary - either individual or business
type.title: Beneficiary Type

schema.description: Response payload containing bank account details
schema.title: Bank Account Response

customerId.description: A unique identifier for the customer initiating the transaction.

bankAccountId.description: The bank account ID when sending from a bank account.

anyOf.description: The payment rail for the source funds (fiat)
The payment rail for the source funds (crypto)

paymentRail.description: The payment rail for the source funds (crypto or fiat)

currency.description: The currency to send (e.g., USD, ETH, USDC)

bankAccountId.description: The bank account ID when sending to a bank account.

walletAddress.description: The wallet address when sending to a crypto wallet.

anyOf.description: The payment rail for the destination (fiat)
The payment rail for the destination (crypto)

paymentRail.description: The payment rail for the destination (crypto or fiat)

currency.description: The currency to receive (e.g., USD, USDC)

wireMessage.description: Optional message for wire transfers, relayed to destination bank (max 140 characters)

achReference.description: Optional reference for ACH transfers, relayed to destination bank (max 80 characters)

sendingAmount.description: The amount to convert and send, expressed in decimals and denominated in the source currency

amount.description: Amount of this fee that was applied

developerFee.description: Specifies additional fees which the developer can charge on top of fern fees
developerFee.title: Developer Fees

schema.description: Get a proposed price for your specified currency route (price guaranteed for 5 mins)
schema.title: Create a new quote

example1.summary: Create a quote for an offramp transaction

example2.summary: Create a quote for an onramp transaction

exchangeRate.description: The rate at which the source currency is multiplied to determine the equivalent amount in the destination currency

receivingAmount.description: The amount that will be received after conversion and fees

minGuaranteedReceivingAmount.description: The minimum amount guaranteed to be received, accounting for potential price fluctuations

expiresAt.description: ISO timestamp when this quote expires (5 minutes from creation)

currency.description: Currency the fee is denominated in

amount.description: Amount of this fee that was applied

usdAmount.description: Amount of this fee that was applied in USD

currency.description: Currency the fee is denominated in

amount.description: Amount of this fee that was applied

usdAmount.description: Amount of this fee that was applied in USD

fees.description: Detailed breakdown of all fees associated with the transaction
fees.title: Transaction Fees

quoteId.description: Identifier of the quote to initiate the transaction

correlationId.description: Optional: You can add your own correlationId to match the transaction to your own internal records.

schema.description: Schema for creating a new transaction
